lyrics:
10 contributorsthe polar express lyricsintro conductor
all aboard all aboard
tickets please tickets
well you coming

verse 1 children both conductor
its a magic carpet on a rail never takes a rest
flying through the mountains and the snow
you can ride for free and join the fun if you just say yes
cause thats the way things happen on the polar express
you bet

chorus children children  conductor
woo woo the whistle blows
thats the sound of her singing
ding ding the bell will ring
golly look at her go
you wonder if youll get there soon anybodys guess
cause thats the way things happen on the polar express

refrain children conductor  both
when we get there well scream yes yeah
well arrive with a
bang bang bang
boom boom boom
laughing all the way
you might also likeverse 2 conductor
its a choochoo with a stunning view
that rivals all the best
but you wont see it advertised
its a simple fact we stay on track
though sometimes we digress
but that can only happen on the polar express

chorus children conductor  children
hiss hiss the steaming mist
thats the sound of her breathing
clang clang the boiler bangs
what a wonderful show
with a comfy seat and lots to eat
boy its just the best
wish it wouldnt ever have to end
with a little luck well be on time
theres no need to stress
cause thats the way things happen on the polar express

bridge conductor
lights are gleaming far across the snow
youre not dreaming
may i present the north pole

verse 3 conductor conductor  children
if its penguins you expect to view
you surely havent guessed
they all live down at the other end
with a little luck well be on time
theres no need to stress
cause thats the way things happen on the polar express
chorus children both conductor
woo woo the whistle blows
thats the sound of her singing
ding ding the bell will ring
golly look at her go
if you want to join us come along
ill check my manifest
cause thats the way things happen on the polar express

instrumental break

refrain children conductor  both
when we get there well scream yes yeah
well arrive with a
bang bang bang
boom boom boom
laughing all the way
if you want to join us come along
you can be our guest
cause thats the way things happen on the
roller coaster the polar express

outro conductor

edbrooke avenue

ah ah ah that is not a toy young man
young man that is not a toy
take your seats please
